prereq.hs: Make sure your phone is turned on.

steps.hs: Open Settings on the phone.
Tap Wi-Fi or Wireless network.
Look at the list of networks. Choose your network.
Enter the Wi-Fi password. Tap Connect.
Wait. You will see a check mark when it's done.
You are now connected to Wi-Fi.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find the network → Move closer to the router.
Wrong password → Double-check uppercase/lowercase letters.

prereq.hs: Have a link or QR code to open.

steps.hs: For a link: Tap the link. It turns blue.
The browser opens automatically. Wait.
For a QR code: Open the camera app.
Point the camera at the QR code. Hold still.
Tap the notification that appears.
The link opens in the browser.

troubleshoot.hs: QR code doesn't work → Use Google Lens instead.
Link doesn't open → Tap and hold, choose Open.

prereq.hs: Have the screen you want to capture open.

steps.hs: Android: Hold Power + Volume Down at the same time.
iPhone: Press Side + Volume Up at the same time.
You see a flash. The image is saved.
Open Gallery or Photos to see the image.
Tap Share to send the image.
Choose how you want to share: SMS, email, WhatsApp.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find the image → Look in the Screenshots folder.
Not working → Try holding the buttons longer.

prereq.hs: Have the Google Translate app installed.
Have the text you want to translate in front of you.

steps.hs: Open Google Translate.
Tap the camera icon at the bottom.
Choose languages: From Swedish to your language.
Point the camera at the text. Hold still.
Tap Scan. Take a picture of the text.
The translation appears over the Swedish text.

troubleshoot.hs: Blurry image → Hold the phone steady, try again.
Wrong translation → Make sure the languages are correct.

steps.hs: Open Google Translate.
Choose languages: From your language to Swedish.
Tap the microphone icon.
Speak clearly in your language.
Wait. The translation appears and is spoken.
Tap the speaker icon to hear it again.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't hear the translation → Turn up the volume on the phone.
Wrong translation → Speak more slowly and clearly.

steps.hs: Go to the website. Tap Log in.
Enter your personal identity number. Tap Next.
Choose BankID on this device.
BankID opens automatically. Wait.
Enter your BankID code. Tap OK.
You are now logged in.

troubleshoot.hs: BankID doesn't open → Open the app manually.
Wrong code → Try again. After three errors you must wait.

prereq.hs: The phone must be near you.

steps.hs: Go to the website on the computer. Click Log in.
Enter your personal number. Choose BankID on another device.
Open the BankID app on the phone.
Tap Identify yourself. Read the information.
Enter your BankID code. Tap OK.
You are now logged in on the computer.

troubleshoot.hs: Don't see anything in BankID → Tap Identify yourself.
Nothing happens → Check that the personal number is correct.

prereq.hs: Have the BankID app on your phone.

steps.hs: Open 1177.se in your browser.
Tap the Log in button.
Enter your personal identity number. Tap Next.
BankID opens automatically. Wait.
Enter your BankID code. Tap OK.
You are now logged into 1177.

troubleshoot.hs: BankID doesn't open → Open the BankID app manually.
Wrong code → Try again. After three errors you must wait.

prereq.hs: The phone must be near you.

steps.hs: Open 1177.se on the computer.
Click Log in. Enter personal number.
Choose BankID on another device.
Open BankID on the phone.
Tap Identify yourself. Enter your code.
You are now logged in on the computer.

troubleshoot.hs: Nothing happens → Check that the personal number is correct.
Nothing shows in BankID → Tap the text 'Identify yourself'.

steps.hs: Go to 1177.se. Log in with BankID.
Tap Inbox or Messages.
You see your messages. New ones are marked.
Tap the message you want to read.
Read the message. Scroll if it's long.
To reply: Tap Reply at the bottom.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find messages → Check Archive as well.
Can't reply → Some messages can't be replied to.

steps.hs: Go to kivra.se. Tap Get Kivra.
Enter your personal identity number. Tap Next.
Log in with BankID on the phone.
Enter your email address. Tap Next.
Choose which letters you want digitally.
Kivra is now activated. You are logged in.

troubleshoot.hs: Already a member → Just tap Log in instead.
Can't find the button → Scroll down the page.

steps.hs: Go to kivra.se. Tap Log in.
Enter your personal identity number. Log in with BankID.
You see your letters. New ones are marked.
Tap the message you want to read.
The letter opens. Read the text or open the PDF.
Tap the PDF icon if you want to save it.

troubleshoot.hs: Don't see a letter → Check the Archive tab as well.
PDF won't open → Tap and hold, choose Open in new tab.

prereq.hs: Have an account on My Pages.
Have the document as a file or photo.

steps.hs: Log in at arbetsformedlingen.se/minasidor.
Tap Send message or My cases.
Find the Attach file or Add button.
Choose the file from your phone or computer.
Wait until the file uploads. Look for green.
Tap Send. The document is now sent.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find the button → Scroll down in the form.
Wrong file format → Use PDF or JPG instead.
File too large → Take a new photo or compress it.

steps.hs: Go to skatteverket.se. Search for 'personbevis'.
Tap Order personbevis.
Log in with BankID.
Choose the type of personbevis. Tap Next.
The personbevis appears as a PDF. Tap Download.
The PDF is saved in Downloads. You're done.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find the PDF → Open Files or Downloads.
Wrong type → Most common is 'Personbevis utan folkbokföringsuppgifter'.

steps.hs: Go to forsakringskassan.se.
Tap Log in or My pages.
Enter your personal identity number. Tap Next.
Log in with BankID on the phone.
You now see My pages. You are logged in.
To upload: Find your case first.

troubleshoot.hs: Can't find the case → Call Försäkringskassan for guidance.
Login error → Check the personal number.

prereq.hs: Have your email address and password.

steps.hs: Open the Gmail app or go to gmail.com.
Tap Log in.
Enter your email address. Tap Next.
Enter your password. Tap Next.
You see your inbox. You are logged in.
Tap an email to read it.

troubleshoot.hs: Wrong password → Tap Forgot password to reset it.
Can't find an email → Check the Spam folder.

prereq.hs: Have the file or photo ready.

steps.hs: Tap Compose or the plus icon.
Enter the recipient's email address.
Write a subject and message if you want.
Tap the paperclip icon to attach a file.
Choose the file from Gallery or Files. Tap OK.
The file uploads. Tap Send.

troubleshoot.hs: File too large → Compress the image or use a cloud service.
Can't find the file → Check the Downloads folder.

prereq.hs: Have the phone ready to show.

steps.hs: Phrase 1: Speak slowly. I am using translation.
Phrase 2: Can you write it? I understand better.
Phrase 3: I need an interpreter for my language.
Phrase 4: Where is the nearest pharmacy?
Phrase 5: I don't understand. Can you help me?
Tip: Show this screen to someone.

troubleshoot.hs: Text too small → Zoom the screen with your fingers.

prereq.hs: Have the phone ready to make a call.

steps.hs: Emergency: 112 (police, ambulance, fire)
1177: Medical advice (non-emergency)
114 14: Information in your language
Police (non-emergency): 114 14
Poison information: 112 (say 'giftinformation')
Tip: Save these numbers in contacts.

troubleshoot.hs: No answer at 112 → Call again, it is always open.
Language problem → Ask for an interpreter in your language right away.
